text: The XG8 Javelin is a Ship-Launched Fighter manufactured by Ram Tah, produced from 3304 to the present. It is part of the Elite Dangerous: Horizons expansion and costs 15,270 CR.
The XG8 Javelin has dimensions of 13.5m x 14.2m x 12.9m, with an armour rating of 10 and shields of 30 MJ. It has a top speed of 316 m/s and a boost speed of 541 m/s.

The XG8 Javelin is an all-rounder fighter with Guardian weaponry, slightly slower than the F63 Condor and less manoeuvrable than the Gu-97. It has substantial damage output, especially against Thargoid craft.

The XG8 Javelin's Shard Launcher has the highest potential damage-per-shot (133) of all three Guardian hybrid fighters, but its slow-moving projectiles make it difficult to use, limiting its range. It has the highest DPS of any fighter.

The XG8 Javelin is most effective against larger, slower targets and less effective against smaller and more nimble enemies. During combat against a Thargoid Interceptor, its Thargon Swarms will prioritise any Ship-Launched Fighters in the area.
